data.eml:eml: New records of processid shrimps from the Indo-West and East Pacific (Crustacea: Decapoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grave, Sammy De, Anker, Arthur (2013): New records of processid shrimps from the Indo-West and East Pacific (Crustacea: Decapoda). Zootaxa 3640 (2): 224-241, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.2.6
